verses.roman:
kabhu eka maṇḍala, kabhu aneka maṇḍala
jala-maṇḍūka-vādye sabe bājāya karatāla

synonyms: kabhu eka maṇḍala—sometimes one circle; kabhu—sometimes; aneka maṇḍala—various circles; jala-maṇḍūka-vādye—like the croaking sound of frogs in the water; sabe—all of them; bājāya—play; karatāla—cymbals.
translation: While in the water they sometimes formed a circle and sometimes many circles, and while in the water they used to play cymbals and imitate the croaking of frogs.
